title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The report mentions excessive flashing in the Control Example but lacks further details.
OB: In the Control Example, when running the application and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it becomes evident that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: The expected behavior is for the Control Example to run smoothly without excessive flashing when resizing the window. The flashing issue needs to be addressed to provide a better user experience.
SR: To reproduce the problem, run the Control Example and resize the window in the vertical direction only. Observe the excessive flashing in all tabs of the TabFolder and Frames.
